data.title: Vesta Technologies – About
data.text:
Vesta Technologies is an independent integration firm specializing in building automation. We develop cost effective solutions for temperature control, lighting, access control, intrusion detection and life/fire/safety systems. We are particularly adept at getting these systems to work in concert and to provide you with the information needed to make good decisions about your energy usage

Vesta Technologies is a fiscally strong organization. We are growing our presence and are committed to developing long-term, cost-effective solutions and supporting our customers’ development needs well into the future.

Our business model is unique in that:

We have written integration code for hundreds of different systems allowing us to speak to virtually any system out there

We use open protocols and systems architecture to maximize flexibility

There is no password lockout making you dependent on us for any future changes

We work with your mechanical contractor of choice empowering them to maintain your service contract

Vesta Technologies, Inc. partners with several control manufactures to provide our customers with the very best in Building Automation Controls and Energy Management products.

Reliable® Controls

Honeywell WEBs

Trend Controls

Vesta also supports Novar Logic One systems. While this product line was discontinued, many of these systems still exist and we continue to provide support and service for them.
